content: "Hello, thank you for taking the time to fill out our survey. Based on your responses, we recommend checking out our line of drivers, specifically those that are custom fit and feature unique, limited edition designs. We understand that you're price conscious, so we'll make sure to show you options that fit your budget goals. Additionally, we'll be sure to highlight men's options that will help you improve your driving. Thank you for considering TaylorMade for your golfing needs. Let us know if you have any questions or need further assistance."
